// ContactUs.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function ContactUs() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Send a POST request to store data in the JSON file await axios.post('http://localhost:5002/contact', formData); // Clear the form after successful submission setFormData({ name: '', email: '', message: '', }); // Display an alert
This is a success messsage
More information about the message can be found{" "} here
} catch (error) { // Handle errors console.error('Error submitting form:', error); } }; return (
